What is your cancellation policy?: Our cancellation policy allows cancellations up to 24 hours before the scheduled departure time for a full refund.
How do I book a flight?: You can book a flight by visiting our website and using our online booking system. Alternatively, you can contact our customer support team for assistance.
Do you offer travel insurance?: Yes, we offer travel insurance for all bookings. You can add travel insurance during the booking process.
What types of payment do you accept?: We accept various payment methods including credit cards, debit cards, PayPal, and bank transfers.
What are the baggage allowances?: Baggage allowances vary depending on the airline and ticket type. You can find detailed information about baggage allowances on our website.
How can I check my flight status?: You can check your flight status by visiting our website and entering your booking reference number or by contacting our customer support team.
What documentation do I need to travel?: You will typically need a valid passport and any required visas for international travel. Domestic travel may only require a government-issued ID. It's important to check the specific requirements for your destination.
